selectedVerses.text: And Jonathan called after the boy, "Hurry! Be quick! Do not stay!" So Jonathan's boy gathered up the arrows and came to his master.
You must tell my father of all my honor in Egypt, and of all that you have seen. Hurry and bring my father down here."

Now therefore proclaim in the ears of the people, saying, 'Whoever is fearful and trembling, let him return home and hurry away from Mount Gilead.'" Then 22,000 of the people returned, and 10,000 remained.
I would hurry to find a shelter from the raging wind and tempest."
a messenger came to Saul, saying, "Hurry and come, for the Philistines have made a raid against the land."
